abstract: unilever pt set at gbx 3,820 by goldman sachs group .
article: unilever has been assigned a gbx 3,820 price target by equities research analysts at goldman sachs group in a research report issued to clients and investors on monday . the brokerage currently has a `` sell '' rating on the stock . goldman sachs group 's price objective would suggest a potential downside of 9.22 % from the stock 's previous close . several other brokerages also recently weighed in on ulvr . bryan , garnier & co restated a `` neutral '' rating and issued a gbx 4,300 target price on shares of unilever in a research note on friday , august 25th .

j p morgan chase & co set a gbx 4,650 target price on shares of unilever and gave the company a `` neutral '' rating in a research note on tuesday , august 29th . liberum capital restated a `` hold '' rating and issued a gbx 3,870 target price on shares of unilever in a research note on wednesday , august 30th . whitman howard upped their target price on shares of unilever from gbx 3,800 to gbx 4,350 and gave the company a `` hold '' rating in a research note on monday , september 25th . finally , ubs set a gbx 4,400 target price on shares of unilever and gave the company a `` neutral '' rating in a research note on monday , october 2nd .

three equities research analysts have rated the stock with a sell rating , nine have given a hold rating and ten have issued a buy rating to the stock . unilever presently has an average rating of `` hold '' and a consensus target price of gbx 4,303 . shares of unilever opened at gbx 4,208 on monday . unilever has a 52 week low of gbx 3,101.50 and a 52 week high of gbx 4,557.50 . trademark violation warning : `` unilever pt set at gbx 3,820 by goldman sachs group '' was published by watch list news and is the property of of watch list news .

if you are accessing this report on another publication , it was illegally copied and reposted in violation of u. s. & international copyright & trademark laws . the original version of this report can be read at company profileunilever plc is a fast-moving consumer goods company . the company 's segments include personal care , which primarily includes sales of skin care and hair care products , deodorants and oral care products ; foods , which primarily includes sales of soups , bouillons , sauces , snacks , mayonnaise , salad dressings , margarines and spreads ; home care , which primarily includes sales of home care products , such as powders , liquids and capsules , soap bars and a range of cleaning products , and refreshment , which primarily includes sales of ice cream and tea-based beverages .
